definition: to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: The activity ended with the issue of 2014 MEIJU Award.
sentences.chinese: 活动最后在2014美居奖设计项目颁奖盛典中结束。

sentences.english: Grand ceremony of an Asia recreational, the brightness raise of God force.
sentences.chinese: 一场亚洲娱乐的盛典，一次偶像力量的辉扬。

sentences.english: The inauguration was a big event.
The non-Jains also express high reverence for this Jain festival.
sentences.chinese: 非耆那教徒也表达了对耆那教盛典的很高的崇敬。

sentences.english: The festival ordains the Jains to observe the ten universal supreme virtues in daily practical life.
sentences.chinese: 盛典命令耆那教徒日常遵守十大美德。

sentences.english: Spring Scream is a musical extravaganza that is held annually in the Kending area.
sentences.chinese: 音乐盛典每年都会在垦丁举行。

sentences.english: Beijing Baosheng Pawn Co. , Ltd. is one of the creative and quasi-financial institutions in Beijing city.
sentences.chinese: 北京宝盛典当有限公司是京城创新型准金融机构之一。

sentences.english: Michael Jackson won three American Music Awards in 1980.
sentences.chinese: 在1980年的全美音乐盛典上，赢得了三个奖项。

sentences.english: The BRIT Awards are the British Phonographic Industry's annual pop music awards.
sentences.chinese: 全英音乐奖是英国唱片产业协会的年度流行音乐盛典。

sentences.english: So every year, the advertising agency gets busy dreaming up its latest extravaganza.
sentences.chinese: 因此，广告公司每年都会忙于想象他们的最新盛典。

sentences.english: The 13th Huabiao award celebration is on show.
sentences.chinese: 第十三届华表奖颁奖盛典正在进行中。

sentences.english: We are proud of this great celebration of football and unity.
sentences.chinese: 我们为这场足球和团结的盛典深感自豪。

sentences.english: The festival is celebrating its fortieth anniversary this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年是这个音乐盛典50周年庆典。

sentences.english: Zhang said it was the timing that saw Yellow Crane Tower out of contention for the Final Draw this year.
sentences.chinese: 张说这也是时候说明黄鹤楼不在举行盛典的讨论中了。

sentences.english: It's undoubtedly one of the biggest classical music events.
sentences.chinese: 它毫无疑问是最隆重的古典音乐盛典之一。

sentences.english: Children play hide-and-go-seek with a puppy, also attending the ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 小狗也以来宾的身份参加盛典，跟小朋友玩起捉迷藏。

definition: to strike a pose (Chinese opera)/(fig.) to make a public appearance/to come out in public (revealing one's true personality, opinions etc)/(of a product) to appear on the market or at a trade show etc
